description.ko: 주파수가 빛나는 기하학적 구조와 유동적인 에너지 파동으로 나타나는, 소리의 숨겨진 구조에 대한 시각적 탐구입니다.
description.en: A visual exploration of the hidden architecture of sound, where frequencies manifest as glowing geometric structures and fluid energy waves.

prompt: ECHO-0, cinematic sound visualization, abstract 3D waveforms pulsating in a dark void, neon cyan and violet light streaks, kinetic digital sculpture, high-speed photography of sonic ripples, 8k resolution, futuristic aesthetic
